#include "stdio.h"

#define N 1001
#define DIGITS 4

int atoi(char c)
{
    return c - '0';
}

int DigitsMultiple(char a[], int start, int end)
{
    int multiple = 1;
    while(start <= end)
    {
        multiple = multiple * atoi(a[start]);
        start++;
    }
    return multiple;
}
//takes input as N digit number in char array format and the no of digits to multiple to get
// return maxProduct of the no of digits
int MaxProduct(char a[], int digits)
{
    int maxProduct = 1;
    int currentProduct = 0;
    int i = 0;
    for(i=0; i<N-digits+1; i++)
    {
        currentProduct = DigitsMultiple(a, i, i+digits-1);
        maxProduct = maxProduct < currentProduct ? currentProduct : maxProduct;
    }
    return maxProduct;
}

int main()
{
    char a[] = "";
  printf("maxProduct = %d",MaxProduct(a, DIGITS));
   return 0;
}
